# Change Log
All notable changes to the "viml" extension will be documented in this file.

# 0.1.7
- Updated readme.
- Updated todo.txt.

# 0.1.6
- Defined `vim-variables`.
- Defined `events`.
- Improved (*though not perfected*) highlighting for:
  - options
  - comments
  - mappings

# 0.1.x
- Updated readme.
- Defined extensions to match.
- Develop.

# 0.0.1 
- Init.
